body:
Hi guys,

I have encountered a wired thing recently with LB. After I run the analysis with LB_SunlightHourAnalysis component, the output option: SunlightHoursLegends color, turned out to be grey. Before I could still have different color. Don`t have a clue, any one knows it?



Here is a attached image.Thank you so much.



Lei
topic: Ladybug Analysis Error, Legend bar display error

replies.body:
Hi guys,

Mostapha help me solved the problem. If any of you get this problem again. pls see my screen shot below.



Cheers.

Lei

Lei,

The best think is to attach your file.

From your image is difficult to say if all surfaces are fully exposed to sun. If so there is no problem.

-A.
